updateJob.provideReasonToCancelNote: Пожалуйста, укажите причину отмены работы. Обратите внимание, что вам будет начислена штрафная сумма, если вы решите продолжить отмену

termsAndConditionsCustomer.background1: DINGDONE (“Dingdone”) operates a website, mobile applications and associated administrative services (together the “Platform”) through which customers (“Users”) can book a Business for the provision of household services such as cleaning, gardening, handyman and other services (“Services”), by submitting a booking request. Dingdone then matches the most suitable Business from its database of Businesses to the booking request. A Business is an independent service provider in the business of providing the Services and is not employed by Dingdone or any of its affiliates.
termsAndConditionsCustomer.background2: These terms and conditions form a contract between Dingdone and the Users for the use of the Platform (“Terms”).
termsAndConditionsCustomer.background3: The User enters into two contractual relationships. The first contract being with Dingdone, governing the access to and use of the Platform in accordance with the Terms. The second contract is between the User and a Business for the provision of the Services and with Dingdone as a technology provider in respect of the Services (“Services Agreement”) as attached as Appendix A and as amended from time to time.
termsAndConditionsCustomer.background4: By accessing and/or using the Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood and agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt1: 1. In these Terms (including the recitals), unless the context otherwise requires:
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt11: 1. “Booking” means the booking made by you for the provision of Services;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt12: 2. “Booking System” means Dingdone’s systems which enable you to make a Booking;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt13: 3. “Service Fee” means the fee, as advised by Dingdone from time to time, (inclusive of goods and service tax, if applicable) for the Services;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt14: 4 “Intellectual Property Rights” means all present and future rights anywhere in the world in relation to copyright, trademarks, designs, patents or other proprietary rights, or any rights to registration of such rights whether existing before or after your access to the Platform;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt15: 5. “Platform Content” means all material, content and information made available on the Platform including but not limited to written text, graphics, images, photographs, logos, trademarks, audio material, video material and any other forms of expression;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt16: 6. “you”, “your”< means you as the user of the Platform.
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt2: In these Terms, unless the context otherwise requires:
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt21: 1. headings are for convenience only and do not affect its interpretation or construction;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt22: 2. the singular includes the plural and vice versa;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt23: 3. references to recitals, clauses, subclauses, paragraphs, annexures or schedules are references to recitals, clauses, subclauses, paragraphs, annexures and schedules of or to these Terms;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt24: 4. words importing a gender include other genders; the word “person” means a natural person and any association, body or entity whether incorporated or not;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt25: 5. where any word or phrase is defined, any other part of speech or other grammatical forms of that word or phrase has a cognate meaning;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt26: 6. a reference to any statute, proclamation, rule, code, regulation or ordinance includes any amendment, consolidation, modification, re-enactment or reprint of it or any statute, proclamation, rule, code, regulation or ordinance replacing it;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt27: 7. all monetary amounts are in Qatari Riyals currency;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt28: 8. a reference to time refers to Qatar Local Time;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt29: 9. “includes” is not a word of limitation; no rule of construction applies to the disadvantage of a party because these Terms are prepared by (or on behalf of) that party
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt210: 10. a reference to any thing is a reference to the whole and each part of it;
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt211: 11. a reference to a group of persons is a reference to all of them collectively and to each of them individually; and
termsAndConditionsCustomer.defAndInt212: 12. a reference to a document includes all amendments or supplements to, or replacements or novations of, that document.

login_screen.signInMessage: Пожалуйста, войдите в свою учетную запись
login_screen.swipe: Проведите пальцем вправо, чтобы вернуться назад

resetPassword_screen.resetPasswordMessage: Пожалуйста, введите ваш адрес электронной почты для сброса пароля

signUp.requirements:
● Минимум 8 символов
● Заглавная буква
● Строчная буква
● Специальный символ
● Цифра

forgotPassword.title: Забыли пароль
forgotPassword.msg: Пожалуйста, введите свой адрес электронной почты ниже, и мы отправим вам код OTP
forgotPassword.verificationMsg: Мы отправили код OTP на ваш мобильный телефон, пожалуйста, проверьте его и введите его ниже
forgotPassword.createNewPasswordMsg: А теперь вы можете создать новый пароль и подтвердить его
